name: Halo Wars 2: Icons of War
description:
A war is defined by its iconic heroes and villains, and now you have a chance to be both with this bundle which includes the Arbiter Leader Pack and the Commander Jerome Leader Pack. Arbiters and Spartans have long been the champions for their respective sides in the ongoing Halo Wars and now you can take command of these champions for the Banished and the UNSC.

The Icons of War Bundle includes all the exciting new powers and units for:
• Commander Jerome: Summon multiple Spartans, autonomous assault exosuits, massive armored APCs, and the heroism of the Spartan program.
• The Arbiter: Build your rage and decimate your foes with the Arbiter’s Conduit of Rage ability, aggressive leader powers, and stasis fields to set your targets up for the perfect kill.
